en: 姬塔 and company save the client's father from the monsters. Inspired by the client's decision to face her family, Clarisse writes a letter to her own family back home.
trans: 姬塔和同伴将委托人的父亲从魔物手中救出来。受这次事件的启发，克拉莉丝给家人回了一封信。

en: 姬塔's crew rescues the client's father from the horde of monsters.
trans: 姬塔的骑空团从魔物的包围中救出了委托人的父亲。

en: The satisfied Clarisse bids farewell to the client, who has resolved to face her family.
trans: 克拉莉丝满足地告别了决定回去面对家人的委托人。

en: Hey, 姬塔! I want to send a letter when we get to the next island. You think we could stop by the Knickknack Shack?
trans: 嘿，姬塔！我想在下一个岛屿寄一封信。我们能在榭洛科特那里停一下吗？

en: Yep! And I had a lot to say, so it got really long!
trans: 是的☆！我有很多话要说，所以写得很长！

en: But I was able to write down everything I was thinking. I wonder how those stubborn people will respond.
trans: 不过我把所有的想法全部都写在上面了，不知道这些顽固的人会怎么回应。

en: Hehe... It'll be interesting to see what kind of reply you get.
trans: 哈哈……好期待你会收到什么样的回复，真有趣。

en: So true! I'm already getting excited just thinking about what they'll say!
trans: 对呀☆！我已经开始在想他们会回些什么了！

en: With that, Clarisse holds up the letter she poured her heart into.
trans: 说到这里，克拉莉丝握紧了手中那封她饱含了她全部情感的信纸。

en: Her communication with her family had a slow start, but the barriers between will one day start breaking down.
trans: 她与家人间的沟通虽然起步缓慢，但这份代沟终有一天将会抹平。
